import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import reducer from'../reducers';var store=createStore(reducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));// Sempre fazer a Dispatch de uma action sempre que quiser alterar o estado global (stateglobal)
export default store;
